name: Service Now CMDB Configuration Template
description: Service Now CMDB configuration record to add and remove CMDB records on create and delete of a server.

metadata.longDescription: Service Now CMDB configuration record to add and remove CMDB records on create and delete of a server. This integration template is responsible for the create of a Service Now CMDB record and is designed to be chained after the creation of a server. Upon deletion of a server, the template will delete the CMDB record from Service Now.

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. A Service Now instance must be available.
2. The Service Now instance must be network accessible from the Terraform container.
3. Upon deletion, the CMDB record is removed from Service Now.
